Articles.Content:
False, the last time I wanted to play Orbiter, I ended up discovering KSP and haven't looked back.

The user below me has stranded Kerbalnauts on Eve.

True, but i never planned to return them in the first place.

The user below me is not very good at making/flying planes.

Yes mostly because my computer is from 2005.

(ONLY 2 GIGS OF RAM!)
The user below me has build a working SSTO

False. I've almost gotten there, but not quite.

The user below me is a physicist.

False. I've actually started studying physics - but now I'm becomming a Math/Physics Teacher.

The user below me likes maths!

It's kinda boring but that might just be having had the worst 2 maths teachers of the school in the last 2 years...

The user below me has been to Hamburg.

No

The user below me hates bureaucracy

Don't know them, passes through the "False" filter.

The user below me touched source code.

True, with skill like a baseball bat.

The user below me has crashed a Kerbal into the sun.

True.

The person below me is good at landing fragile spaceplanes.

False. I'm terrible at anything regarding planes in this game:-(

the user below me speaks three or more languages.

True. I speak Slovak, English and Czech fluently, and I also understand German very well.

The user below me found this thread by accident.

Nope.

The user below me is happy I necromanced this thread.

Yup

The user below me will not be me.
Nope, the user below me has

Ah........... how about NO!!!

The user below me is a kerballionaire (kerbal millionaire).

Yes! The user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below meuser below me user below me user below me user below me user below me user below me....

did not read all of that fully.

yup, eyes crossed right quick.

The user below me has never seen me around before

True.

The user below me has never played Orbiter.

True!

The user below me is a teenager.

True.

The user below me is using a computer they built themselves.

Semi-true. I had it built by a computer tech who is a family friend but I designed it myself.

The user below me will have a mac.

False. Never had, and never will.

User below me is a user.

True, I'm a user, always will be...

The user below me has an avatar
